subject: Deployment of Officers of IHMCL at NHAI Regional Offices.-reg.

No.254105)} Sub: Deployment of Officers of IHMCL at NHAI Regional Offices.-reg: IHMCL has decided to recruit and post Officers (Engineer (ITS)) at field level for effective supervision and monitoring of Toll Management Systems (TMS), Advanced Traffic Management Systems (ATMS) , and other Intelligent Transport   Systems (ITS). Their responsibilities would include ensuring the smooth operation and maintenance, SLA adherence of TMS and ATMS through regular inspections, technical troubleshooting, and coordination with system integrators (SI) for maintenance. Their role would also involve data management, analysing regular reports on ITS operations, maintenance activities, and system performance: Additionally, the Officers of IHMCL would assist Regional Offices/ Project Directors   (ROs/ PDs) in implementing new ITS projects, provide technical support, and ensure compliance with relevant standards. 2 In this regard, it has been decided that the IHMCL Officers shall be posted at Regional Offices (RO) of NHAI and the Regional Officers of NHAI shall provide the following facilities to them_ 2.1 The necessary office space, stationery, computing and network resources and other allied items required for the effective functioning f the Officers of IHMCL 2.2 The provisions of vehicles for IHMCL Officers through the existing vehicle contractor at respective RO office as per the terms &  conditions of prevalent NHAI circular for provision of vehicles to Field Officers (Deputy Managers/ Managers) of NHAI. However_ the cost  towards provision of vehicle for the IHMCL Officers shall be reimbursed by IHMCL to the respective ROs. 3 IHMCL Officers posted at ROs shall functionally report to the respective NHAI ROs, ensuring that their work aligns with regional day-to-day operational needs and objectives_ Administrative reporting, however , would be centralized at the IHMCL Headquarter, allowing for consistent oversight and coordination of ITS-related activities across the country. 4 In case more than oe Field Officers are posted at & Regional Office, the respective Regional Officer may distribute the Stretches / PIUs/ Toll Plazas to IHMCL Officers under intimation to IHMCL HQ 5_ This issue with the approval of Competent Authority. bHl (CS.
